description: Product description XHC Moisturising conditioner for healthy and shiny hair, 400 ml. This tea tree oil conditioner has been specially formulated with tea tree oil and peppermint oil to restore shine and promote healthy hair and scalp. How to use: Apply generously after shampooing and leave for 1-2 minutes, then rinse hair thoroughly. Warning: avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with clean water, rinse well. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Ingredients Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulphate, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Cl 19140, Cl 42090 Directions 1. Wet hair thoroughly. 2. Apply a generous amount of conditioner to hair, focusing on ends. 3. Massage into hair for even distribution. 4. Leave on for a few minutes. 5. Rinse thoroughly.
